import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get user activity timeline"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/{UserId}/activities"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



**Prerequisites**: This endpoint requires UUIDs from other API calls:
1. **UserId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) → Extract `Items[].UserId`

**Workflow Example**:
1. Search for user: [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users)
2. Extract UserId from response
3. [GET /api/v1.0/users/\{UserId\}/activities](/docs/api/users/get-user-activities)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"UserId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"User identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier. Obtain via POST /api/v1.0/users and extract `Items[].UserId`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"}}},{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to retrieve","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records per page","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":20}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
